title: Biohackers and wellness influencers are pushing nicotine as part of their ‘stacks’
description: As smoking rates fall in the U.S., startups and influencers are pushing the purported cognitive and health benefits of indulging in nicotine.
content: As smoking rates fall in the U.S., startups and influencers are pushing the purported cognitive and health benefits of indulging in nicotine.
